Control Name: SI-7 (14) BINARY OR MACHINE EXECUTABLE CODE
Control Statement: The organization: (a) Prohibits the use of binary or machine-executable code from sources with limited or no warranty and without the provision of source code; and(b) Provides exceptions to the source code requirement only for compelling mission/operational requirements and with the approval of the authorizing official.
